name: strptime
purpose: Parse a time/date generated with strftime

return.description:
Returns an array or FALSE on failure.The following parameters are returned in the array
      
       
        
         parameters
         Description
        
       
       
        
         "tm_sec"
         Seconds after the minute (0-61)
        
        
         "tm_min"
         Minutes after the hour (0-59)
        
        
         "tm_hour"
         Hour since midnight (0-23)
        
        
         "tm_mday"
         Day of the month (1-31)
        
        
         "tm_mon"
         Months since January (0-11)
        
        
         "tm_year"
         Years since 1900
        
        
         "tm_wday"
         Days since Sunday (0-6)
        
        
         "tm_yday"
         Days since January 1 (0-365)
        
        
         "unparsed"
         the date part which was not
          recognized using the specified format

notes.description:
This function is not
implemented on Windows platforms.

"tm_sec" includes any leap seconds (currently upto 2
       a year). For more information on leap seconds, see the Wikipedia article
       on leap seconds.
